system.requirements:
Tier 2; None
Aptitudes: Perception, Fieldcraft, Tzeentch
system.effect: Gains +2 to Initiative Rolls. GM can secretly test the character's Perception to notice hidden threats. They gain a twitchy disposition and have trouble relaxing.

description.value: Gains +2 to Initiative Rolls. GM can secretly test the character's Perception to notice hidden threats. They gain a twitchy disposition and have trouble relaxing.
